name: Deep Learning Research Engineer (audio/speech processing)
description:
We at Samsung AI Center are looking for Deep Learning Research Engineers of any grade from intern to expert engineer.

We develop new speech enhancement methods for Samsung devices: Galaxy Buds and smartphones. Although our work is practically oriented, the outcome of our work includes patents and research papers on the top conferences. The practical deliverables are proof of the concept and prototype applications.

Responsibilities:

  • Read deep learning audio processing papers, reimplement the most promising ideas if necessary

  • Solve real-world problems by taking the best out of the data, models and architectures

  • Invent new better and faster models and training procedures, or modify the old ones

  • Write papers to the top conferences, apply for the patents, open-sourcing the research code, present the results to colleagues and the broader audience in other ways

  • Develop Proofs-of-Concepts, prototypes and demo applications

Requirements:

  • Familiarity with modern trends and latest achievements in deep learning

  • Basic mathematical background

  • Strong programming skills (Python, PyTorch) and knowledge of standard algorithms and data structures

  • Ability to quickly read a scientific paper and understand its main ideas and results

  • Experience in neural networks implementation, training, and debugging

As a plus:

  • Publications at ML conferences

  • Competitive ML achievements, e.g. Kaggle

  • Experience in signal processing or acoustics

  • Experience in GANs, conditional GANs, audio related deep learning models

  • Experience in deep learning models’ compression, e.g., knowledge of pruning and quantization techniques

  • Experience in contribution to IT products and services

  • Experience in C/C++ development and high load


Work conditions:

  • Challenging research & engineering tasks at the cutting edge of the modern audio processing

  • Cozy modern office in 2 minutes from Belorusskaya Circle Line

  • Competitive salary

  • Corporate lunches (Food compensation)

  • Medical and life insurance

  • 7 days of paid sick leaves (without sick leave certificate)

  • Corporate discount on company goods

  • Flexible working time

  • Full compliance with Russian Labor Code

  • Fitness room, shower, partial fitness compensation

  • Relocation and interview expenses compensation

  • Conferences compensation

    About us:

  • Samsung AI Center – Moscow has been founded in 2018
  • We are sitting in White Square business center
  • We currently have three labs (Visual Understanding, Multimodal Data Analysis, Machine Learning)
  • …and many projects on such topics as:
    • Generation of photorealistic human avatars
    • Point clouds-based 3D image and video synthesis
    • Techniques for image manipulation using generative networks
    • Training neural networks using Bayesian methods
    • Creation of multi-agent systems
    • Single-view and multi-view 3D reconstruction
    • Localization and navigation using 3D vision
    • And more!
  • Over past three years, our researchers have published more than 30 papers at the world's best conferences on computer vision and machine learning, including CVPR, ICCV / ECCV, NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, IROS, WACV and others
